mod.name: Downfall
mod.description:
Downfall is a full-featured Expansion for Slay the Spire, including a new 5th hero, a new campaign with 7 villains to play, new relics, new cards, new potions, and more. 
 
 The Heart demands that this endless cycle of slaughter be finished.  Answer the call as a Villain, and see to the defense of the Spire. 
 
 This mod is a combination modpack which includes the former mods known as Slimebound Mod, Guardian Mod, and Playable Snecko, along with a ton of new content, a new character, and much more.
 
 Design and Code Credits: 
 
 MichaelMayhem, Vex, kiooeht, Alchyr, erasels, The Evil Pickle, Blank the Evil, JohnnyDevo, AlexDrieger, Erim-Nelhah, Darkglade, Vaylen, SuperLuigi231, Kalene, Cheetah-shooter, arctic_mists .  Art Credits: Freshbone - Character Select and Bonfire Art, Half-GoblinHankins - Card Art, AlexMdle - Card Art, Cás de Mattos - Card Art, Rita-B - Alternate Skin Art, Casey Yano - Monster Art, Noob Cannon and the Marisa Team - Misc Card Art 
 
 Art Use Credit: reddit u/justaschema, Bruce Brenneise, reddit u/Atrolux, Chronometrics, George Eracleous. 
 
 Music Credit: PandorasBread 
 
 Testers and Helpers: Reina, moocowgoesmoo, Jedi, Skyson, Chufmoney, zwolfiez, Tiamoko, Ashlyn/IcyColdFire, squeeny, A Cake Wearing a Hat, ServetTayberkSalads, blalo'u, ComingVirus  
 
 Localization Aid - borloch

Exhaust.

cards.name: From Beyond
cards.description: For each card in your exhaust pile, a random enemy loses 5 HP.

cards.name: From Beyond+
cards.description: For each card in your exhaust pile, a random enemy loses 7 HP.

cards.name: Gambit
cards.description:
Put 2 random Attacks from your discard pile into your hand. They cost 1 less this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gambit+
cards.description:
Put 3 random Attacks from your discard pile into your hand. They cost 1 less this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Heroic Bravado
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 hermit:Rugged.
Increase the cost of this card by 2 this combat.

cards.name: Heroic Bravado+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 hermit:Rugged.
Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

cards.name: High Noon
cards.description: Whenever you play a Strike or Defend, draw a card.

cards.name: High Noon+
cards.description: Whenever you play a Strike or Defend, draw a card.

cards.name: Magnum
cards.description:
Discard 6 cards.
For each card, deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Magnum+
cards.description:
Discard 6 cards.
For each card, deal 7 damage.

cards.name: Overwhelming Power
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Draw 3 cards.
Whenever you end your turn with 0 Energy, lose 4 HP.

cards.name: Overwhelming Power+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Draw 3 cards.
Whenever you end your turn with 0 Energy, lose 2 HP.

cards.name: Purgatory
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 24 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Purgatory+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Reprieve
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Heal 12 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reprieve+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Heal 15 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Roughhouse
cards.description:
Deal 24 damage. hermit:Dead_On:
Gain 20 Block.

cards.name: Roughhouse+
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage. hermit:Dead_On:
Gain 24 Block.

cards.name: Roundhouse Kick
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage to ALL enemies.
hermit:Stun any that don't intend to attack.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Roundhouse Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage to ALL enemies.
hermit:Stun any that don't intend to attack.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Bronze Core
relics.description: The first time you create a Function each combat, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Replace once every 50,000 years.

relics.name: Bronze Gear
relics.description:
The first time you enter guardianmod:Defensive_Mode each combat, gain an additional 10 Block.
Guardian starts the run with a random common Gem.
relics.flavorText: Protection where you need it most.

relics.name: Champion's Crown
relics.description: At the start of combat, enter Defensive or Berserker Stance.
relics.flavorText: A WINNER IS YOU!

relics.name: Heart of Goo
relics.description: Whenever you slimeboundmod:Consume, heal 2 HP, up to 8 each combat.
relics.flavorText: I feel so funky.

relics.name: Mob Leader's Staff
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain [E] , draw 1 card, and Swap to the next Gremlin.
relics.flavorText: Among gremlin mobs, the one with the best horn maintains complete command over the troupe, until another one manages to steal it.

relics.name: Old Locket
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Memento into your hand.
relics.flavorText: There's a faded picture inside.

relics.name: Snecko Soul
relics.description: The first time you play an sneckomod:Offclass card in a combat, gain [E] and draw a card.

relics.name: Spirit Brand
relics.description: The first time you Ignite a Ghostflame each turn, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: A bound protector.

relics.name: Baalor's Lordly Plate
relics.description: Whenever you guardianmod:Brace, Brace 1 more.
relics.flavorText: One can never have enough armor.

relics.name: Black Powder
relics.description: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies for each hermit:Dead_On effect triggered.
relics.flavorText: Handle with care.

relics.name: Blank Card
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add an gremlin:Echo of a random card from your deck to your hand. It costs 0 .
relics.flavorText: Card Mimic.

relics.name: Brass Tacks
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Metallicize.
relics.flavorText: The luster on these tacks never seems to fade.

relics.name: Bronze Idol
relics.description: Status cards may now be played for useful effects.
relics.flavorText: An ancient, weaponised antivirus - who knows who made it, and why?

relics.name: Defensive Thesis
relics.description: Defensive Stance's Finisher Bonus grants 5 more Block.
relics.flavorText: Pro tip: Don't get hit.

relics.name: Dolphin's Style Guide
relics.description: If you end your turn while in no Stance, draw 1 additional card next turn.
relics.flavorText: Author: Renowned explorer and pugilist Dolphin K. Mist.

relics.name: Fragmentation Grenade
relics.description: Damage dealt to random enemies is increased by 3.
relics.flavorText: Nobody dares to ask where the Gremlin got it from.

relics.name: Goop Dweller
relics.description: At the start of combat, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser Slime.
relics.flavorText: He followed me home. Can I keep it?

relics.name: Jar of TOBSCo
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 hexamod:Intensity.
relics.flavorText: A little extra heat makes everything better.

relics.name: Loaded Die
relics.description: Cards that choose random numbers have +1 minimum.
relics.flavorText: Cheese-stuffed.

relics.name: Pick of Rhapsody
relics.description: You can now Mine for 2 guardianmod:Gems at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).
relics.flavorText: With as many gemstones that litter the Spire, it is hard to imagine anyone so unlucky to have needed this Pick to aid them.

relics.name: Protective Goggles
relics.description: If you end your turn with no Encoded cards, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: Look closely.

relics.name: Seal of Approval
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 3 Unidentified Character cards to add to your deck. All future Unidentified Character cards found will be of this character.
relics.flavorText: I'm The Ironclad and this is my favorite Relic in the Spire. -Merchant Advertising Pamphlet

relics.name: Silver Bullet
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a copy of Piercing Shot to your hand. It costs 0 .
relics.flavorText: Spirewolves are long gone.

relics.name: Sneaky Teakwood Match
relics.description: At the start of each combat, hexamod:Ignite the current Ghostflame and hexamod:Advance.
relics.flavorText: Lights on any surface!

relics.name: Supply Scroll
relics.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain a Supply Scroll.
relics.flavorText: A surprisingly detailed inventory of the mob's various bits and bobbles.

relics.name: Tricky's Bolster-Rod
relics.description: The first time you play a Power card each combat, gain 6 Block and 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Backed by the study of a thousand books. Knowledge is power!

relics.name: Wizard Hat
relics.description: Whenever you consume Wiz, remove a debuff at random.
relics.flavorText: The accompanying robes have long since been stolen.

relics.name: Arumba's Pocket Sentry
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, alternates between:
Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Sentry Mode active. Target acquired. No hard feelings.

relics.name: Broken Tooth
relics.description: Whenever you beat an Elite encounter, gain 1 Strength at the start of each combat for the rest of the Act.
relics.flavorText: Appears too large to have come from a human jaw...

relics.name: Cable Spool
relics.description: Encode a copy of the first Encodable card you play each combat.
relics.flavorText: Tangled...

relics.name: Deca's Washers
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 3 additional cards and add a Dazed into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It is unclear why Deca collects these.

relics.name: Gelatinous Cube
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Hey, it stuck to your body.

relics.name: Impeccable Pecs
relics.description:
Whenever you gain Strength, gain an equal amount of Temporary_HP.
Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Glorious.

relics.name: Jeremiah's Banner
relics.description: At the start of combat, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Leeching Slime and gain 1 Slime slot.
relics.flavorText: You and ooze army.

relics.name: Magic Mallet
relics.description: Whenever you apply Weak, gain 1 Wiz, up to 3 times per turn.
relics.flavorText: Stubs toes twice as hard.

relics.name: Pilot's Codex
relics.description: If you end your turn with no cards in guardianmod:Stasis, choose 1 of 3 cards to place into guardianmod:Stasis.
relics.flavorText: Designs and diagrams of the Spire's earliest manually-driven prototypes, by Master Pilot David.

relics.name: Red Candle
relics.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 2 hexamod:Soulburn.
relics.flavorText: Fire BURNS...

relics.name: Ring of the Snek
relics.description: At the start of combat, apply 0-2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Illegible, unreadable, due by Thursday.

relics.name: Slime Soup
relics.description: When you enter a Rest Site, begin the next combat with a Prepare card that costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Tastes awful, but incredibly healthy.

relics.name: Spyglass
relics.description: If you end your turn hermit:Concentrated, gain an additional [E] next turn .
relics.flavorText: Property of Kestin Highfin.

relics.name: Straight Razor
relics.description: Whenever you remove or Transform a card from your deck, heal 15 HP.
relics.flavorText: For a cleaner shave...

relics.name: Super Snecko Eye
relics.description: Replaces Snecko Eye. At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused. The first time you draw a card that costs 3 each combat, reduce its cost to 0.

relics.name: Wizard Staff
relics.description: Wiz deals 7 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: The pride and joy of every Gremlin Wizard, this staff is a frequent target of theft by rival mobs.

relics.name: Wound Poker
relics.description: At the end of each turn, deal 6 damage to each Weakened enemy.
relics.flavorText: Does it hurt when I do this?.

relics.name: Charred Glove
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Curse, your next attack deals 3 more damage.
relics.flavorText: Parts of the glove still glow with otherworldly cinders.

relics.name: Deflecting Bracers
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain champ:Counter equal to half the amount of expired Block.
relics.flavorText: If you thought blocking was good then...

relics.name: Dueling Glove
relics.description: After using a single-target Attack, if the target has no Vulnerable, apply 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: Count from ten...

relics.name: Frost Primer
relics.description: All Functions you create gain Retain.
relics.flavorText: 22 ounces of the chemical compound Ar22, shelf life: 22 years. Best stored in a mahogany fridge.

relics.name: Gemstone Gun
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 3 guardianmod:Gems. At the start of each combat, gain a card with Retain, Exhaust, and each chosen Gem socketed.
relics.flavorText: Bang! Bang! Bang! Hey, I matched three!

relics.name: Gladiators Manual
relics.description: Whenever you play a Combo, a Finisher, and enter a Stance in the same turn, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Try everything - something will stick.

relics.name: Gremlin Bomb
relics.description: Whenever a Gremlin dies, deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Gremlins have an uncanny knack for finding dangerous things. Sometimes, they even survive looting them.

relics.name: Gremlin Gravestone
relics.description: Dead Gremlins can be Resurrected at Rest Sites as a Free Action.
relics.flavorText: Where do gremlins go when they die? Not bloody far enough.

relics.name: Horseshoe
relics.description: Whenever you gain Weak, Frail or Vulnerable, gain 1 less.
relics.flavorText: Lucky charm. Somebody is gonna be missing this.

relics.name: Mallet
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 2 copies of Fine Tuning+ to your hand.
relics.flavorText: That's it! I'm gettin me mallet!

relics.name: Prickly Shields
relics.description: Whenever you gain Block, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Gremlins use whatever scraps they can find as weapons or armor. Some serve as both.

relics.name: Red Scarf
relics.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: It's warm and fuzzy.

relics.name: Rye Stalk
relics.description: At the start of each combat, all enemies lose 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Still in mint condition, despite being chewed on for so long.

relics.name: Sack of Gems
relics.description: Upon pickup, add 5 random guardianmod:Gems to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Ooh... shiny!

relics.name: Signature Finisher
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Finisher. This Finisher costs 0, can be used without a Stance, and never causes your Stance to be exited.
relics.flavorText: And now, it's time for my ULTIMATE MOVE!

relics.name: Six-Point Brand
relics.description: Whenever you play 6 cards, deal 6 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, FIRE!

relics.name: Slimed Tail
relics.description: When you fall below 50% of your Maximum HP, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Guerilla Slime, and the next time you take damage, your leading slime is slimeboundmod:Absorbed instead. (works once per combat).
relics.flavorText: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat, completely covered in slime.

relics.name: Slimy Skull
relics.description: Whenever you apply slimeboundmod:Goop, apply an additional 1 slimeboundmod:Goop.
relics.flavorText: A Snecko skull in absolutely awful condition. Unclean and slimy, dirt and grime stick to it like glue.

relics.name: Snake-Charmer's Flute
relics.description: sneckomod:Muddled cards can't cost 3.
relics.flavorText: Sssssss...

relics.name: Soul of Chaos
relics.description:
The fourth Ghostflame becomes a Mayhem Ghostflame.
Mayhem Ghostflame activates when you end your turn on it.
Ignition: Play the top card of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Mayhem, made manifest.

relics.name: Spectre's Hand
relics.description: Whenever you Enter a Stance, gain a basic Strike or Defend. It costs 0 and has Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: Some victories stay with you.

relics.name: Stone of Nomakk
relics.description: At the start of combat, Split into a slimeboundmod:Mire Slime and gain 1 slimeboundmod:Potency.
relics.flavorText: When presented to one of your Goop Gang, it seems to make the blob dance.

relics.name: Thermal Stone
relics.description: If hexamod:Soulburn detonates, heal 4 HP at the end of combat.
relics.flavorText: A fire would liven this thing up!

relics.name: Unidentified Egg
relics.description:
Identifying becomes a free action.
Unidentified cards in card rewards are Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: What will hatch? Pay $1000 to see.

relics.name: Bandit Contract
relics.description: At the start of the 3rd boss combat, Red Mask Bandits will assist you.
relics.flavorText: An agreement from the Bandit trio - partially in exchange for a trinket, but mostly in exchange for their lives.

relics.name: Bandit Contract+
relics.description: At the start of the 3rd boss combat, Red Mask Bandits will assist you.
relics.flavorText: An agreement from the Bandit trio - partially in exchange for a trinket, but mostly in exchange for their lives.

relics.name: Black Knight's Helm
relics.description:
The first time you enter each Stance each combat:
Defensive: Gain 2 Dexterity and lose 1 Strength.
Berserker: Gain 2 Strength and lose 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Only a flesh wound.

relics.name: Bottled Code
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card with Encode. Start each combat with this card Encoded.
relics.flavorText: Actually, I have code for that exact thing...

relics.name: Broken Wing Statue
relics.description: The cultists that worship the Awakened One will be interested in this.
relics.flavorText: A broken hunk of a once-magnificent statue.

relics.name: Coat of Many Faces
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain Cultist Headpiece, Face Of Cleric, N'loth's Hungry Face, Gremlin Visage, and Ssserpent Head.
relics.flavorText: It was Steve, and Bill, and Ian, and Fred, and John...

relics.name: Emerald Heart Blessing
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The heart is everything.

relics.name: Extra Cursed Bell
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain 2 of a unique Curse and 3 relics.
relics.flavorText: You think you hear it echoing, but can never confirm it.

relics.name: Extra Cursed Key
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain 2 Curses.
relics.flavorText: Locked away for good reason.

relics.name: Greed Ooze
relics.description:
At the start of combat, spawn Greed Ooze (can be revived if Absorbed).
At Rest Sites, Greed Ooze will take 50 of your souls, increasing its damage by 1.
relics.flavorText: A friend found in the Spire who devours souls.

relics.name: Gremlin Sack
relics.description: Upon pickup, add 6 cards to your deck from the Match Game.
relics.flavorText: The Gremlin and his bodyguard were no match for you.

relics.name: Inner Strength
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: It's about the gigantic sword in your heart.

relics.name: Knowing Skull
relics.description: At the start of each combat, you may wish for Souls, Success, or a Pick me Up.
relics.flavorText: Put me down!

relics.name: Mystical Octahedron
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card that selects a random number for its effects. This card always selects its maximum possible number.
relics.flavorText: It appears weighted toward one side.

relics.name: Neow's Blessing
relics.description:
Upon pickup, increase your Maximum HP by 100.
Increase your Maximum HP by 100 at the start of each Act.
Lose all your Potion slots.
Draw 1 less card and lose [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Ease your rage. Be as tough and unyielding as the Spire itself.

relics.name: New Challenger
relics.description: Start each combat in a random Champ Stance.
relics.flavorText: Can you take the crown?

relics.name: Paradox Artifact
relics.description: At the start of each turn, add a random card with Encode to your hand and give it Ethereal.
relics.flavorText: You've never seen a coding frenzy like this before.

relics.name: Quantum Chamber
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card removed from your deck. At the start of your 4th turn, return it and 2 copies of it to your hand.
relics.flavorText: You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.

relics.name: Ruby Heart Blessing
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The heart is strong.

relics.name: Sapphire Heart Blessing
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.
relics.flavorText: The heart is pleased.

relics.name: Scrap Ooze
relics.description:
At the start of combat, spawn Scrap Ooze (can be revived if Absorbed).
At Rest Sites, you can donate a card to the Scrap Ooze, modifying its damage:
+1 damage for Uncommons
+2 damage for Rares
-1 damage for Commons
-2 damage for Curses

relics.name: Sharpened Fragment
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain a Crystal Shiv.
relics.flavorText: Once a broken statue - now a makeshift weapon.

relics.name: Teleport Stone
relics.description: You may skip any number of rooms the next time you move, but cannot move into a Boss Room.
relics.flavorText: Never leave home without it.

relics.name: The Broken Seal
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10, then heal all of your HP. Start each combat with 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, and 2 hexamod:Intensity. You can not receive The Broken Seal again.
relics.flavorText: Unlimited, unrestrained, unquenchable power.

relics.name: The Heart's Malice
relics.description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will flee in terror.
relics.flavorText: The malice of corruption bestowed by the Heart.

relics.name: Wheel of Change
relics.description: At each Rest Site, you may spin the wheel once. Choosing to collect its reward uses up this relic.
relics.flavorText: No one gets two spins, he says.

relics.name: Young Snecko
relics.description: Deals 5 damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Bewilderingly adorable.

relics.name: Black Heart of Goo
relics.description:
Replaces Heart of Goo.
Whenever you slimeboundmod:Consume, heal 3 HP, up to 15 each combat.
relics.flavorText: The Secret of the Ooze.

relics.name: Clasped Locket
relics.description: Replaces Old Locket. First time you draw a curse each turn, Exhaust it and draw 2 cards. Upon pickup, obtain 2 Injuries.
relics.flavorText: It won't open anymore.

relics.name: Dented Plate
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, gain [E] and draw 1 card at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Several bullets are still lodged inside.

relics.name: Electromagnetic Coil
relics.description: Functions are now made up of 4 cards.
relics.flavorText: An inefficient but entertaining power source.

relics.name: Gremlin Leader's Voucher
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Upon pickup, permanently lose a Gremlin.Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Upon pickup, permanently lose a Gremlin.
relics.flavorText: IOU 1 Gremlin

relics.name: Guardian Gear
relics.description:
Replaces Bronze Gear.
Begin each combat in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode, which persists for 3 turns.
relics.flavorText: Replace every 3,000 floors.

relics.name: Idol of Retromation
relics.description: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the most expensive card in your hand by 1 for this turn.
relics.flavorText: Often called the Idol of Reto for short.

relics.name: Lucky Horseshoe
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 3 Unidentified Character cards. Add 5 copies of it to your deck. All combats drop an additional card reward of the chosen character's cards.
relics.flavorText: Make your own luck.

relics.name: Makeshift Battery
relics.description: Gain [E] and add a Slimed into your discard pile at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: It's an 8.9 volt.

relics.name: Mark of the Ether
relics.description:
Replaces Spirit Brand.
The first time you Ignite a Ghostflame each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Let’s see if we can do... better.

relics.name: Mob Leader's Crown
relics.description:
Replaces Mob Leader's Staff.
The first time you shuffle your draw pile each turn, gain [E] , draw 1 card, and Swap to the next Gremlin.
relics.flavorText: The fancier the symbol of office, the more likely it is to be stolen.

relics.name: Platinum Core
relics.description:
Replaces Bronze Core.
The first 3 Functions you create each combat cost 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: Changelog: Improved user experience.

relics.name: Power Armor
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Your maximum Vigor and champ:Counter is 10.
relics.flavorText: Bought used.

relics.name: Short Stature
relics.description: The first time a Gremlin would die each combat, heal it to 75% of your Max HP instead.
relics.flavorText: It is easy to get away with mischief if you are literally beneath their notice.

relics.name: Shotglass
relics.description: First 2 times you use a potion each combat, gain a random potion. You can only use 2 potions each combat.
relics.flavorText: Any liquid placed inside changes into something else.

relics.name: Super Snecko Soul
relics.description:
Replaces Snecko Soul[].
The first time you play an sneckomod:Offclass each turn, gain [E] .

relics.name: Tarr Blob
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, lose 1 Slime slot.
relics.flavorText: The bad kind of Slime.

relics.name: Tiny Bowler Hat
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a Study the Spire card to your hand. It costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Whosoever controls the hat, controls the Spire.

relics.name: Victorious Crown
relics.description:
Replaces Champion's Crown.
Start each combat in champ:Ultimate Stance, which lasts for 1 turn.
relics.flavorText: Conglaturation!! You are the greatest winner.

relics.name: Wander Bots
relics.description:
On pickup, lose 2 Stasis slots.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: These drones find the most wonderful salvage, but require processing power to maintain.

relics.name: Xanatos' Icy Charm
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. hexamod:Soulburn takes 4 turns to activate.
relics.flavorText: I feel... cold.

relics.name: Barbell
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, if you have at least 10 Upgradable cards in your deck, Upgrade one at random.
relics.flavorText: 1000 reps? Psh. I can do 1001.

relics.name: Berserker's Guide
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 3 Vigor.
relics.flavorText: The text is illegible.

relics.name: Bottled Anomaly
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. At the start of each combat, remove it from your draw pile. At the start of turn 3, add it into your hand. It costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Swirling and swirling and finally breaking.

relics.name: Bottled Black Hole
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card in guardianmod:Stasis.
relics.flavorText: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

relics.name: Cryo Chamber
relics.description: Gain 1 Stasis slot. Whenever a card enters guardianmod:Stasis, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: Things always seem better coming out than they did going in.

relics.name: Donu's Washers
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain [E] [E] and add 1 Void into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It is rather clear why Donu collects these.

relics.name: Olexa's Shield
relics.description: Swap the positions of the Bolstering Ghostflame and the first Searing Ghostflame.
relics.flavorText: Protection on-demand.

relics.name: Pet Ghost
relics.description: First time you would die each combat, survive with 1 HP instead.
relics.flavorText: Poor guy.

relics.name: Protective Gear
relics.description: Reduce the damage you take from slimeboundmod:Tackles by 3.
relics.flavorText: The best defense is a good offense.

relics.name: Rare Booster Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a Unidentified Rare card of each card type.
relics.flavorText: Mint condition.

relics.name: Recycler
relics.description: The first time an non-Status and non-Curse Ethereal card is Exhausted each combat, add a copy to your hand that costs 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: One day, it shall be recycled too.

relics.name: Sleeved Ace
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain a Pure Luck with Retain.
relics.flavorText: We're all aces.

relics.name: Stolen Merchandise
relics.description:
Whenever you Swap, gain an Echo of a random Colorless card.
At the start of combat, the Merchant gains 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "Blasted, thieving Gremlins!".

relics.name: Tag Teamwork
relics.description:
Whenever you draw Tag Team, draw another card.
Upon pickup, add two copies of Tag Team to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Teamwork makes the dream work.

potions.name: Bottled Dupe
potions.description: Swap to a random Gremlin.

potions.name: Ecto-Cooler
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Ethereal cards from any class to gain. It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Jar of Slime
potions.description: Apply 15 Goop.

potions.name: Machine Oil
potions.description: Increase all numbers on Encoded cards by 1 except cost.

potions.name: Potentially Potent Potion
potions.description: Deal 1-40 damage.

potions.name: Strategy Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 2 cards which Enter a Stance to gain (one for each Stance). It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Temporal Potion
potions.description: Accelerate all cards in Stasis 2 times.

potions.name: Tonic
potions.description: Gain 1 Rugged.

potions.name: Alchyrical Elixir
potions.description: Remove all Compile Error effects from the next Function you create, it costs 0 until played.

potions.name: Black Bile
potions.description: Apply 6 Bruise.

potions.name: Bottled Technique
potions.description: Trigger your current Stance's Skill Bonus 5 times.

potions.name: Combustive Fluid
potions.description: Ignite the current Ghostflame 3 times.

potions.name: Eau de Grem
potions.description: Use all 5 Gremlin Abilities 2 times.

potions.name: Exotic Beverage
potions.description: Reduce the cost of Offclass cards in your hand by 1.

potions.name: Polishing Oil
potions.description: Enter Defensive Mode for 1 round.

potions.name: Slimy Elixir
potions.description: Whenever an effect applies Goop this combat, apply 2 more.

potions.name: Army in a Bottle
potions.description: Spawn 3 random Slimes (Normal or Specialist).

potions.name: Gremlin In A Jar
potions.description: Resurrect a random Gremlin at 50% of your Max HP.

potions.name: Inferno Potion
potions.description: Ignite the Inferno Ghostflame.

potions.name: Kio's Clever Concoction
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to Encode, repeat until you create a Function.

potions.name: Liquid Luck
potions.description: Gain Lucky for 1 turn.

potions.name: Liquid Void
potions.description: Put 1 card from your exhaust pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Quantum Elixir
potions.description:
Gain Stasis slots until you have 3.
Repeat 3 times: choose 1 of 3 cards to place into Stasis.

potions.name: Stimpack
potions.description: Enter Ultimate Stance for 1 turns.

keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Do not lose Block at the end of the turn.

keywords.name: Compile
keywords.description:
An effect that triggers when this card is merged into a Function.
Can be a negative effect, which is referred to as an 'Error'.

keywords.name: Cycle
keywords.description: Discard a card, drawing a new card to replace it.

keywords.name: Encode
keywords.description:
Encode a card.
When 3 cards are Encoded, their effects (other than Encode) are merged into a Function that costs 1.

keywords.name: Insert
keywords.description: Shuffle a card into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Technique
keywords.description: If you are in a Stance, trigger its Skill Bonus.

keywords.name: Finisher
keywords.description:
Requires being in a Stance.
After playing a Finisher, exit your Stance and trigger its Finisher bonus.

keywords.name: Berserker
keywords.description:
Stance.
Skill Bonus: Gain 2 Vigor.
Finisher Effect: Gain 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Combo
keywords.description: Extra effect when played in the listed Stance.

keywords.name: Counter
keywords.description: The next time you take Attack damage, deal damage back.

keywords.name: Defensive
keywords.description:
Stance.
Skill Bonus: Gain 3 Counter.
Finisher Effect: Gain 10 Block.

keywords.name: Fatigue
keywords.description: Lose HP. Restore Fatigued HP at the end of combat. You won't die from Fatigue .

keywords.name: Gladiator
keywords.description:
Stance.
Skill Bonus: Draw a card.
Finisher Bonus: Next turn, draw 1 card and gain [E] . End your turn.

keywords.name: Ultimate Stance
keywords.description:
Stance. Counts as both Defensive and Berserker Stances.
If you leave this Stance before it expires, immediately re-enter it.

keywords.name: Boss
keywords.description: You may only play 1 Boss card in a turn.

keywords.name: Exhume
keywords.description: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand.

keywords.name: Invincible
keywords.description:
You cannot lose more than a given amount of HP in a single turn.
At the end of any round in which Invincible prevented HP loss, remove it.

keywords.name: Reclaim
keywords.description: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your discard pile.

keywords.name: Shackled
keywords.description: Shackled creatures lose Strength for a turn.

keywords.name: Agony
keywords.description: Creatures in Agony deal 80% less damage with Attacks.

keywords.name: Cripple
keywords.description: Crippled enemies can no longer lose Weak. At the end of their turn, they lose HP equal to their Weak.

keywords.name: Echo
keywords.description: Echoes are copies of cards with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Fat Gremlin
keywords.description: After you play an attack, apply 1 Weak to all targets.

keywords.name: Gremlin Wizard
keywords.description: After you play a skill, gain 1 Wiz.

keywords.name: Mad Gremlin
keywords.description: Gain 2 Temporary Strength when attacked.

keywords.name: Gremlin Nob
keywords.description: At the start of your turn, add 1 Bellow , Skull Bash and Rush to your hand.

keywords.name: Shield Gremlin
keywords.description: After you play a skill, gain 2 Block.

keywords.name: Sneaky Gremlin
keywords.description: After you play an attack, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Steal
keywords.description: Target loses specified amount of resource. You gain the amount that was lost.

keywords.name: Swap
keywords.description: Switch places with another character. Does nothing if there is no valid target.

keywords.name: Wiz
keywords.description: When you have at least three stacks of Wiz, Attacks will consume all stacks to deal 10 additional damage.

keywords.name: Accelerate
keywords.description: Reduce the turn counter of the right-most card in Stasis by 1.

keywords.name: Brace X
keywords.description: Reduce the HP loss required to trigger Mode Shift by X.

keywords.name: Buffer
keywords.description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.

keywords.name: Defensive Mode
keywords.description:
Stance.
Gain 10 Block when entering Defensive Mode.
While in Defensive Mode, you have 3 Thorns, gain 10 Block at the start of your turn, and your Block does not expire.

keywords.name: Downgrade
keywords.description: Remove an upgrade from a card.

keywords.name: Gem
keywords.description: Gems can be placed into Sockets in cards at a Rest Site. Cannot be Upgraded.

keywords.name: Package
keywords.description: 0-cost Exhausting Skill that generates three cards inspired by a chosen Construct of the Spire, and reduces their cost by 1 for this combat.

keywords.name: Socket
keywords.description: Gems can be placed into this Socket at a Rest Site.

keywords.name: Stasis
keywords.description:
A card in Stasis stays there for amount of turns equal to its cost plus 1.
When exits, it is returned to your hand and costs 0 until played.

keywords.name: Tick
keywords.description: When this card's Stasis turn counter is reduced...

keywords.name: Volatile
keywords.description: When this card leaves Stasis, it Exhausts.

keywords.name: Concentration
keywords.description: The next Dead On card played while Concentrated triggers its effect regardless of position. Wears off on turn end.

keywords.name: Dead On
keywords.description: Dead On cards have a bonus effect when in the middle of your hand.

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: Stunned enemies skip their turn.

keywords.name: Bounty
keywords.description: Normal Enemy: 15 gold. Elite Enemy: 40 gold. Boss: 100 gold.

keywords.name: Bruise
keywords.description: Bruised targets take more attack damage. Wears off on turn end.

keywords.name: Rugged
keywords.description: Reduces next instance of attack damage taken to 2.

keywords.name: Active
keywords.description: The Active Ghostflame can be Ignited by meeting its listed Ignition requirements.

keywords.name: Advance
keywords.description: Move to the next Ghostflame. Moving onto a Ghostflame Extinguishes it.

keywords.name: Afterlife
keywords.description: If this card is Exhausted, its effects activate.

keywords.name: Bolstering
keywords.description: Ghostflame. Ignites when a Power is played while Active. Ignition: When Ignited, gain 4 Block and 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Crushing
keywords.description: Ghostflame. Ignites when 2 Skills are played while Active. Ignition: When Ignited, deal 3 damage to a random enemy twice.

keywords.name: Extinguish
keywords.description: Allows Ghostflame to become Ignited again, resetting its Ignition requirements.

keywords.name: Ignite
keywords.description: Triggers the Ignition effect described on a Ghostflame.

keywords.name: Intensity
keywords.description: Intensity increases the amount of damage, Soulburn, and Block applied by Ghostflames when Ignited.

keywords.name: Retract
keywords.description: Move to the previous Ghostflame. Moving onto a Ghostflame Extinguishes it.

keywords.name: Seal
keywords.description: If all 6 Seals have been played this combat (with no redundant ones), obtain The Broken Seal and remove the Seals from your deck.

keywords.name: Searing
keywords.description: Ghostflame. Ignites when 2 Attacks are played while Active. Ignition: When Ignited, apply 4 Soulburn to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Soulburn
keywords.description: After 3 turns, a Soulburned enemy loses HP, removing the Soulburn effect.

keywords.name: Absorb
keywords.description: Manually recombine with your leading Slime, granting you 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Ancient Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 3 and causes you to draw 1 card each turn.

keywords.name: Bronze Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 10 to ALL enemies each turn, but skips every other attack.

keywords.name: Bruiser Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 5 each turn.

keywords.name: Buried
keywords.description: Buried cards will always be chosen last for random Exhume effects.

keywords.name: Command
keywords.description: Your leading Slime attacks.

keywords.name: Consume
keywords.description: Bonus effect which activates when an Attack is used on an enemy who has Goop.

keywords.name: Cultist Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 6 each turn, then increases its damage by 1.

keywords.name: Darkling Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 3 each turn. When Commanded, other Darkling Slimes also attack.

keywords.name: Ghostflame Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 3 and applies 5 Soulburn each turn.

keywords.name: Goop
keywords.description: The next attack deals 1 more damage per Goop, removing all Goop and triggering any Consume effects.

keywords.name: Guerilla Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 3 to ALL enemies each turn.

keywords.name: Insulting Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 4 and applies 1 Vulnerable each turn.

keywords.name: Leeching Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 1 and grants you 3 Block each turn.

keywords.name: Lick
keywords.description: 0-cost cards that apply Goop with a variety of secondary effects.

keywords.name: Mire Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 2 and applies 2 Goop each turn.

keywords.name: Potency
keywords.description: Increases the damage of ALL of your Spawned Slimes. Secondary effects increase by 1 for every 2 Potency.

keywords.name: Spiky Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 4 and grants you 4 Temporary Thorns each turn.

keywords.name: Slow
keywords.description: Receives 10% more damage per card played in a turn.

keywords.name: Specialist
keywords.description: A unique slime with a more powerful effect than normal slimes.

keywords.name: Spire Boss
keywords.description: Powerful 0-cost cards, inspired by the bosses of the Spire.

keywords.name: Split
keywords.description:
Spawn a Slime minion, who attacks at the start of each turn.

If you have no empty slots, your oldest Slime is automatically Absorbed to make room, granting you 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Tackle
keywords.description: High-damage Attacks that also deal a small amount of damage to you.

keywords.name: Time Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 4 and applies 1 Weak each turn.

keywords.name: Torch Head Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 6 each turn. Gains damage from your Strength.

keywords.name: Identify
keywords.description: Replace an Unidentified card with its current random card permanently.

keywords.name: Lucky
keywords.description: Cards that choose a random number as part of their card text choose the maximum possible number. (Does not affect Muddle)

keywords.name: Muddle
keywords.description: Muddling a card changes its cost this turn to between 0 and 3.

keywords.name: Offclass
keywords.description: An Offclass card is any obtainable card from a class other than your own (including Colorless cards, Curses, and Statuses).

keywords.name: Snekproof
keywords.description: Snekproof cards aren't affected by Confusion and cannot be Muddled.
